Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Hexagon \Hex"a*gon\, n. [L. hexagonum, Gr. ? six-cornered; "e`x six (akin to E. six) + ? angle.] (Geom.) A plane figure of six angles. [1913 Webster]
{Regular hexagon}, a hexagon in which the angles are all equal, and the sides are also all equal. [1913 Webster]
